title: Goldstore
description: A seamless platform for buying and selling molten gold with a clean and professional user interface.Includes a dedicated customer panel for managing orders and tracking transaction status.An admin dashboard with full control over users, orders, and detailed reporting.

landing.title: landing-page
landing.desc: The Landing Page serves as the first point of interaction with a clean and engaging design.Smooth animations enhance user experience and help illustrate key processes intuitively.An FAQ section clarifies common questions, while a smart calculator allows real-time conversion between gold and Rial prices.

auth.title: Authentication-page
auth.desc: The authentication process is designed as a step-by-step flow to provide a clear and smooth user experience.In the first step, the user enters their mobile number, followed by a verification code in the second step.If the user is new, a third step appears with a personal information form to complete the registration.

adminPanel.title: Admin-panel
adminPanel.desc: The admin dashboard provides a comprehensive management panel for full control and oversight of the platform’s various sections.It includes modules for managing inventory, handling gold and cash withdrawal requests, and configuring system settings.A dedicated reports section offers detailed views of transactions, gold purchases, and sales, enabling precise monitoring of financial activities.

userPanel.title: User-panel
userPanel.desc: The user panel offers a simple and efficient platform for managing financial transactions and gold trading.Users can easily deposit funds, submit withdrawal requests, and perform gold buying and selling operations.Additionally, the reports section provides clear and detailed tracking of transactions and order statuses.

title: MetallugicalWeb
description: This project was developed for the Metallurgy Research Center at Islamic Azad University, aimed at streamlining the process of managing laboratory services and bookings. The platform enables the admin team to upload and manage all available services, while customers can easily browse, reserve, and interact with the system.

landing.title: landing-page
landing.desc: A seamless platform for buying and selling molten gold with a clean and professional user interface.Includes a dedicated customer panel for managing orders and tracking transaction status.An admin dashboard with full control over users, orders, and detailed reporting.

auth.title: Authentication-page
auth.desc: This sequence illustrates the user registration process. Initially, the user enters their phone number and receives an OTP to verify their identity and ensure secure login. In the second step, the system checks the OTP and determines whether it is the user's first login. First-time users are redirected to a registration form to fill in their personal information, while returning users are directed to the appropriate dashboard based on their role — Admin or Customer. For enhanced security, both the access token and refresh token are stored in HTTP-only cookies. The registration form uses the react-hook-form library to manage input validation efficiently and smoothly.

adminPanel.title: Admin-panel
adminPanel.desc: These images showcase different sections of the laboratory management dashboard, providing comprehensive control over users, reservations, services, and blog posts. At the top, summary cards display key metrics such as the number of users, reservations, services, and blog entries, while the Recent Reservations section shows details like user name, contact, service type, dates, and payment status. User and service management allows editing, deleting, or adding new items, including assigning user roles, service details, and uploading images. The Blog section covers managing categories and posts, with new post creation done in two steps: first, entering main details, selecting categories, and uploading a cover image; second, adding a header description and main content using the Tiptap rich-text editor. The dashboard’s design is clean and intuitive, enabling quick access to important data for efficient administration.

userPanel.title: User-panel
userPanel.desc: Each reservation entry includes details such as the user name, phone number, service name, reservation duration, payment status, reservation dates, and the latest step in the process. Users can view all their active reservations along with these details and track the most recent completed step of each reservation. By clicking the action button, they are redirected to the corresponding step to continue and complete the reservation process. Additionally, users can create a new reservation via the Add button, while the Reports feature provides access to detailed records of canceled or successfully completed reservations, including all related information.

receptionPanel.title: Reservation
receptionPanel.desc: The reservation process begins when the user selects a service either from the Services section or from their dashboard. After clicking the Reserve button, a modal opens with detailed information such as price, description, and available dates predefined by the admin. Once a date is chosen, the request moves to the approval stage, where the customer sees a waiting screen and the admin enters details like rental duration, price, and notes. At this point, the admin can approve, reject, or cancel the request, with rejections sending the process one step back. After approval, the customer proceeds to payment by uploading a receipt, which the admin reviews before granting final confirmation. Once approved, the reservation is successfully completed, and both the customer and admin receive a confirmation with full details

more.title: Services
more.desc: In the Services section, users can browse all available devices added by the admin. Each device includes a quick overview, and by selecting 'View More' the user is redirected to a detailed page. The details page provides comprehensive information such as device name, description, image gallery, and available reservation dates. From here, the user can continue directly into the reservation process for the selected device.

title: Laser-Hair-Removal-Clinic
description: Inspired by cyberpunk aesthetics, this project features WebGL backgrounds and futuristic UI themes.

landing.title: landing-page
landing.desc:
This platform is specially designed for laser hair removal clinics to make the work easier for admins, receptionists, and clients.

It includes three separate dashboards, each made for a different type of user:

Admin Dashboard,
Receptionist Dashboard,
and Client Dashboard,

Each dashboard has its own features that help manage daily tasks, improve communication, and make the overall process faster and more organized.
More details about each dashboard and its features are provided below.

auth.title: Authentication-page
auth.desc: This process begins when the user enters their phone number and receives a one-time password (OTP) for verification. After entering the OTP, the system confirms their identity and grants access to the customer dashboard. For security, admin and receptionist logins are separated from the customer flow, and authentication tokens are stored securely using cookies to prevent unauthorized access.

adminPanel.title: Admin-panel
adminPanel.desc: The Admin Dashboard provides a complete set of tools to manage the clinic efficiently. It includes features such as a home page with daily client statistics, estimated revenue, and income charts, as well as a weekly calendar for scheduling operators and managing appointments. Admins can oversee staff roles, add or remove employees, and manage laser treatment areas with customizable pricing and durations. The dashboard also provides access to client lists and detailed customer profiles, including medical history and session records. Additionally, settings allow the admin to configure working hours, adjust reservation rules, and update security preferences, ensuring smooth operations across the platform.

userPanel.title: User-panel
userPanel.desc: The Customer Dashboard is designed to give users full control over their profile and reservations. From the home page, clients can create new bookings, view past session reports, and manage their personal information such as name, ID, medical history, and contact details. The reservation process is simple and step-based: users first select the desired treatment areas, then choose a suitable date and time from the available schedule defined by the admin. In the final step, they review and confirm all details before completing the booking. Once reservations are made, clients can track their status and view session details, including treatment areas, schedule, and total cost, through the Session Reports section.
